item.description:
Agenda 21: The Grinch who stole your private property rights, right to choose what you eat, and much, much more.

Holiday strolls and parades are a great opportunity to do outreach to big crowds. Only 15% of the U.S. population knows about Agenda 21. Come help educate people about the diabolical Agenda 21 that in NH, comes in the form of Granite State Futures and Plan NH. The stroll is from 5-10. Letâ€™s meet at the Dunkin Donuts on Main Street, across from the park. I will have materials to hand out, but please bring your own if you wish to help out. Thanks!!!

http://downtownnashua.org/holidaystroll/
item.name: Granite State Future / PlanNH / Agenda 21 Outreach at Nashua Holiday Stroll
